meanings.definition: A small pine tree with edible seeds.
meanings.sent1: The pinyon stood proudly in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I collected some pinyon seeds for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to hide the pinyon seeds in my shoe!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as the shade of a pinyon tree.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pinyon tree filled the air with warmth.

meanings.definition: The edible seed of a pinyon tree.
meanings.sent1: I roasted the pinyon before eating it.
meanings.sent2: The pinyon added a delicious crunch to the salad.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the pinyon seed was a tiny spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a handful of pinyon seeds.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the pinyon lingered on my tongue, delightful.
